original_text: And laid them down at the apostles' feet: and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need.
korean_text: 사도들의 발 앞에 두매 그들이 각 사람의 필요를 따라 나누어 줌이라

sentences.original_text: And laid them down at the apostles' feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 사도들의 발 앞에 내려놓고

sentences.original_text: and distribution was made unto every man
